topic.title: How to Change the Numbering System of Ordered Lists

body.p: It is possible to change all lists to have a different numbering system and there are several methods that can be used to achieve this.

section.title: Use the list-style-type CSS Property.
section.p: The Chemistry engine supports the following types: decimal, decimal-leading-zero, lower-roman, upper-roman, lower-latin, upper-latin, lower-alpha, upper-alpha.
